## Locale Test

```{r}
Sys.setlocale("LC_MESSAGES", 'en_US.UTF-8')
cat("Current locale:", Sys.getlocale(), "\n")
price <- "€10.50"
print(paste("The price is", price))
french <- "éèêëç"
print(paste("French characters:", french))
```
